[b][color=grey][size=3]Close by Mzulft, lost since countless years, an abandoned site has been recently discovered, which leads to an ancient nordic temple.What it hides? What mysterious forces are hidden behind the great entrance door? The smell of death gets intense and stronger approaching the ruins, an ancient evil rules this place and keeps forgotten treasures along with restless spirits. Will you last the Black Rock?[/color][/size][/b]
